docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Project layout ¶ 1 2 3 4 mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. $\LaTeX$

docs.text: 卷积输入输出特征图尺寸大小计算 ¶ $L_\text{out}=\lfloor \frac{L_\text{in}+2\times \text{padding}-\text{dilation}\times(\text{kernel\_size}-1)-1}{\text{stride}}+1\rfloor $
